skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-based skill containing design guidelines and documentation. The JavaScript plugin file contains only basic logging and template code with no network, filesystem, or command execution capabilities. No malicious patterns detected.

content.value_statement: This skill helps you build production-grade web interfaces with bold, memorable aesthetics. It guides creative choices for typography, color, motion, and spatial composition to avoid generic AI-generated designs.
actual_capabilities: Creates production-ready HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code
Implements React and Vue components with full functionality
Designs distinctive typography and color palette systems
Builds responsive layouts with creative spatial composition
limitations: Does not generate backend code or database schemas
Does not handle state management beyond local component state
Does not integrate with external APIs or services

use_cases.title: Build production UI components
use_cases.description: Generate polished React or Vue components with distinctive aesthetics and full functionality

use_cases.title: Prototype visual concepts
use_cases.description: Create visual prototypes with bold design directions and high-fidelity interactions

use_cases.title: Quick landing pages
use_cases.description: Build complete landing pages with animations and responsive layouts from natural language descriptions

prompt_templates.title: Basic component
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a button component with hover animation and focus states

prompt_templates.title: Full page design
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a landing page for a coffee shop with warm colors and smooth animations

prompt_templates.title: Interactive dashboard
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a dark-mode analytics dashboard with charts, filters, and hover interactions

prompt_templates.title: Complex application
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a music streaming player with album art, playback controls, playlist management, and staggered animations

output_examples.input: Create a settings panel with dark mode toggle
output: Returns complete React component with toggle switch animation
Includes proper accessibility attributes and keyboard navigation
Dark mode applies smoothly with CSS custom properties

best_practices: Provide clear context about purpose, audience, and technical constraints
Specify the desired aesthetic direction (minimalist, brutalist, retro, etc.)
Mention specific frameworks or libraries you want to use
anti_patterns: Asking for generic components without specifying design direction
Requesting overly complex designs without performance considerations
Skipping accessibility requirements for interactive elements

faq.question: Which frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill generates code for HTML/CSS/JS, React, Vue, and other frontend frameworks based on your requirements.

faq.question: Can it create complete web applications?
faq.answer: It creates frontend interfaces with full functionality. Backend integration requires additional tools or manual implementation.

faq.question: Does it handle responsive design?
faq.answer: Yes, all generated components include responsive layouts that work across different screen sizes.

faq.question: Is my code data safe?
faq.answer: The skill runs locally and does not transmit code or project data to external servers.

faq.question: Why does my design look different each time?
faq.answer: The skill intentionally varies aesthetic choices to avoid repetitive generic designs.

faq.question: How is this different from standard code generation?
faq.answer: This skill emphasizes distinctive aesthetics, bold creative choices, and production-ready quality over generic templates.
